pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw: That is correct. We originally designed the imported to map SVG paths to SDF polylines. But that doesn't work with the svg files that are produced by the dxf exporter that SRI wants to use (like chassis.svg, where contours are made of independent line segments). Since we also want to keep the original SDF polyline behavior, the SVG importer now creates SDF polylines automagically.
content.html: That is correct. We originally designed the imported to map SVG paths to SDF polylines. But that doesn't work with the svg files that are produced by the dxf exporter that SRI wants to use (like chassis.svg, where contours are made of independent line segments). Since we also want to keep the original SDF polyline behavior, the SVG importer now creates SDF polylines automagically.
